subject: Follow Up
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Derek, 

My apologies for the delayed follow up. 

I wanted to get some answers prior to sending you anything. 

After speaking with Caroline and My Director we could do a three month Trial, where at the end of the three months you have an out clause if you don't want it, or if you do the trial converts to a contract.  Usually the trials go 30 days just fyi.  I fought for as long as I could. 

I have attached a quote for your review, however I have some creative ideas to make this less expensive if you are open to a quick call.  I am talking possibly half or more depending on a few things. 

Thanks  

-- 

	
David Johnson
Account Executive
